alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Estill County through 745 PM EDT... At 709 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winston, or near Irvine, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sandhill around 715 PM EDT. Rice Station, Kings Station, Blackburn and Calloway Crossing around 720 PM EDT. Weedon around 725 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Irvine, Witt, West Irvine, North Irvine, Wisemantown, Ravenna, South Irvine and Station Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
